availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Tingle. Father of Nancy Tingle, [Unknown] Tingle, and Lewis Alexander Tingle. Resident of Henry County, Kentucky, in 1830. Resident of Henry County in 1840. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Fifth Manuscript Census of the United States(1830), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, p. 317.
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States(1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, p. 270.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 259.
C. Price et. al.Kentucky Cemetery Records Project, Volume 1: Henry County(Frankfort: Kentucky Historical Society).
